tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Database 19c and the workshop.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Get an Oracle Cloud Free Tier account and sign in.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Generate SSH Keys - Cloud Shell
tutorials.description: Steps to generate SSH keys using Cloud Shell.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Obtain a Compute Image with Staged Oracle Database 19c Installer Files
tutorials.description: Obtain a compute instance wtih staged Oracle Database 19c installer files by using Resource Manager.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Install Oracle Database 19c with Automatic Root Script Execution
tutorials.description: Install Oracle Database 19c with automatic configuration script execution.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Obtain a Compute Image with Oracle Database 19c Installed
tutorials.description: Obtain a compute instance that has Oracle Database 19c already installed by using Resource Manager

tutorials.title: Appendix A: Create a Compute Instance with X11 Forwarding
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create a compute instance and configure it for X11 forwarding in preparation for an Oracle Database 19c installation.

tutorials.title: Appendix B: Create a Compute Instance with VNC Server
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create a compute instance and configure it with VNC Server in preparation for an Oracle Database 19c installation.

tutorials.title: Appendix C: Perform Prerequisite Tasks for an Oracle Database 19c Installation
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to prepare your compute instance for an Oracle Database 19c Installation.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
